extendedInfo.description: A must have app for every Nepali. Now listen to nepali fm with an interactive player. View nepali patro including time/time, rashifal ( Horoscope), monthly calendar,date converter, currency converter, tithi for next 10 year, sub shahit, gold and silver price, and yet more to come.The recently added "Hamro Radio" features all major nepali fm across Nepal and the abroad; including kantipur fm, kalika fm, Image fm, radio sagarmatha, other many local and internet stations. The player itself is best of its kinds. While listening to fm, you can get detail information about the stations including their logo, website, contact number, email address, and link to program schedule. In addition to nepali fm, this application is first android app that shows price and trends of Gold and Silver as determined by Nepal Gold and Silver association. Finding out Gold, and Silver has never been this easier. We hope you will find this app useful whether you are in Nepal or Abroad. If you loved using this app, please give us 5-start for continuous support and update.Feature:1.  English - Nepali Dictionary2. Share today info via twitter/facebook 3. Event info for 20704. Push Notification!!!5. Interactive Online nepali fm6.  Gold and Silver Price7. Date and currency converter8. Rashifal / Horoscope.9. Beautiful time and calendar widgets Here is what people are saying about this app:"well, the app has introduced several new features like currency converter and date converter in a complete new look. Introduction to 'hamro radio' has simply removed mine need of another app - tune in radio. With the improved GUI and the new logo; - a sign of nepali flag the app could be no better. So, A++ for that."  A Google User - January 2, 2013 "With latest update this is probably the best app developed by a nepali. Clean UI, radio, date converter what more can you ask for. But still I think the today page is kinda dirty. You shouldn't have changed the color of time. Anyway im leaving one star to keep you motivated for development. It deserves 5 star."A Google User - January 3, 2013 ***This app uses unmodified version (0.8) of FFmpeg (ffmpeg.org/) and LibMMS (Launchpad.net/libmms) licensed under the LGPLv2.1
